special_text:
[+1]: Draw a card, then discard a card.
[-2]: Until end of turn, whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 blue Wizard creature token with prowess.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, draw a card” and “If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.”
